verses.verse: And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H5804>Gaza<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> there a <S%H802>harlot<s%>, and went in unto <S%H935>her<s%>.

And it was told the <S%H5841>Gazites<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H8123>Samson<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5437>hither<s%>. And they compassed him in, and laid <S%H693>wait<s%> for him all <S%H3915>night<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and were <S%H2790>quiet<s%> all the <S%H3915>night<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Let be till <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H216>light<s%>, then we will kill <S%H2026>him<s%>.

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H7901>lay<s%> till <S%H2677>midnight<s%>, and <S%H6965>arose<s%> at <S%H2677>midnight<s%>, and laid <S%H270>hold<s%> of the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4201>posts<s%>, and plucked them <S%H1280>up<s%>, bar and <S%H7760>all<s%>, and put them upon his <S%H3802>shoulders<s%>, and <S%H5265>carried<s%> them <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>.
And it came to pass <S%H310>afterward<s%>, that he <S%H157>loved<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> in the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H7796>Sorek<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H1807>Delilah<s%>.

And the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> unto <S%H559>her<s%>, and said unto <S%H6601>her<s%>, Entice <S%H7200>him<s%>, and see wherein his <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H3201>lieth<s%>, and by what means we may prevail against <S%H631>him<s%>, that we may bind him to <S%H6031>afflict<s%> <S%H5414>him<s%>: and we will give thee every <S%H376>one<s%> of us eleven <S%H505>hundred<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver<s%>.

And <S%H1807>Delilah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8123>Samson<s%>, <S%H5046>Tell<s%> <S%H1419>me<s%>, I pray thee, wherein thy great <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H631>lieth<s%>, and wherewith thou mightest be bound to afflict <S%H6031>thee<s%>.

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H631>her<s%>, If they bind me with <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3892>green<s%> <S%H3499>withes<s%> that were never <S%H2717>dried<s%>, then shall I become <S%H2470>weak<s%>, and be as <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H120>man<s%>.

Then the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> brought <S%H5927>up<s%> to her <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3892>green<s%> <S%H3499>withes<s%> which had not been <S%H2717>dried<s%>, and she bound him with <S%H631>them<s%>.

Now she had <S%H693>liers-in<s%>-wait <S%H3427>abiding<s%> in the inner <S%H2315>chamber<s%>. And she <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6430>him<s%>, The Philistines are upon <S%H8123>thee<s%>, Samson. And he <S%H5423>brake<s%> the <S%H3499>withes<s%>, as a <S%H6616>string<s%> of <S%H5296>tow<s%> is <S%H5423>broken<s%> when it <S%H7306>toucheth<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%>. So his <S%H3581>strength<s%> was not <S%H3045>known<s%>.

And <S%H1807>Delilah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8123>Samson<s%>, <S%H2048>Behold<s%>, thou hast mocked <S%H1696>me<s%>, and told me <S%H3577>lies<s%>: now <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H631>me<s%>, I pray thee, wherewith thou mightest be bound.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H631>her<s%>, If they only bind <S%H631>me<s%> with <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H5688>ropes<s%> wherewith no work hath been <S%H4399>done<s%>, then shall I become <S%H2470>weak<s%>, and be as <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H120>man<s%>.

So <S%H1807>Delilah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H5688>ropes<s%>, and <S%H631>bound<s%> him <S%H559>therewith<s%>, and said unto <S%H6430>him<s%>, The Philistines are upon <S%H8123>thee<s%>, Samson. And the <S%H693>liers-in<s%>-wait were <S%H3427>abiding<s%> in the inner <S%H2315>chamber<s%>. And he <S%H5423>brake<s%> them off his <S%H2220>arms<s%> like a <S%H2339>thread<s%>.

And <S%H1807>Delilah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8123>Samson<s%>, <S%H2008>Hitherto<s%> thou hast <S%H2048>mocked<s%> <S%H1696>me<s%>, and told me <S%H3577>lies<s%>: <S%H5046>tell<s%> me wherewith thou mightest be <S%H631>bound<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H707>her<s%>, If thou weavest the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4253>locks<s%> of my <S%H7218>head<s%> with the <S%H4545>web<s%>.

And she <S%H8628>fastened<s%> it with the <S%H3489>pin<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6430>him<s%>, The Philistines are upon <S%H8123>thee<s%>, Samson. And he <S%H3364>awaked<s%> out of his <S%H8142>sleep<s%>, and plucked <S%H5265>away<s%> the <S%H3489>pin<s%> of the <S%H708>beam<s%>, and the <S%H4545>web<s%>.

And she <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H349>him<s%>, How canst thou <S%H559>say<s%>, I <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H3820>thee<s%>, when thy heart is not with <S%H2048>me<s%>? thou hast mocked me these <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%>, and hast not <S%H5046>told<s%> me wherein thy <S%H1419>great<s%> strength <S%H3581>lieth<s%>.

And it came to <S%H6693>pass<s%>, when she pressed him <S%H3117>daily<s%> with her <S%H1697>words<s%>, and <S%H509>urged<s%> <S%H5315>him<s%>, that his soul was <S%H7114>vexed<s%> unto <S%H4191>death<s%>.

And he <S%H5046>told<s%> her all his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5927>her<s%>, There hath not come a <S%H4177>razor<s%> upon my <S%H7218>head<s%>; for I have been a <S%H5139>Nazirite<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%> from my <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H990>womb<s%>: if I be <S%H1548>shaven<s%>, then my <S%H3581>strength<s%> will <S%H5493>go<s%> from <S%H2470>me<s%>, and I shall become weak, and be like any other <S%H120>man<s%>.

And when <S%H1807>Delilah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that he had <S%H5046>told<s%> her all his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, she <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Come <S%H5927>up<s%> this <S%H6471>once<s%>, for he hath <S%H5046>told<s%> me all his <S%H3820>heart<s%>. Then the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> unto <S%H5927>her<s%>, and brought the <S%H3701>money<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And she made him <S%H3462>sleep<s%> upon her <S%H1290>knees<s%>; and she <S%H7121>called<s%> for a <S%H376>man<s%>, and shaved <S%H1548>off<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4253>locks<s%> of his <S%H7218>head<s%>; and she <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H6031>afflict<s%> <S%H3581>him<s%>, and his strength went from <S%H5493>him<s%>.

And she <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> are upon <S%H8123>thee<s%>, Samson. And he <S%H3364>awoke<s%> out of his <S%H8142>sleep<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, I will go <S%H3318>out<s%> as at other <S%H6471>times<s%>, and <S%H5287>shake<s%> myself <S%H3045>free<s%>. But he knew not that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was departed from <S%H5493>him<s%>.

And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H270>laid<s%> hold on <S%H5365>him<s%>, and put out his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>; and they brought him <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H5804>Gaza<s%>, and <S%H631>bound<s%> him with fetters of <S%H5178>brass<s%>; and he did <S%H2912>grind<s%> in <S%H631>the<s%> <S%H1004>prison-house<s%>.
Howbeit the <S%H8181>hair<s%> of his <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to grow <S%H6779>again<s%> <S%H834>after<s%> he was <S%H1548>shaven<s%>.

And the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> gathered them <S%H622>together<s%> to <S%H2076>offer<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> unto <S%H1712>Dagon<s%> their <S%H430>god<s%>, and to <S%H8057>rejoice<s%>; for they <S%H559>said<s%>, Our <S%H430>god<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H8123>Samson<s%> our <S%H341>enemy<s%> into our <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And when the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H1984>him<s%>, they praised their <S%H430>god<s%>; for they <S%H559>said<s%>, Our <S%H430>god<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into our <S%H3027>hand<s%> our <S%H341>enemy<s%>, and the <S%H2717>destroyer<s%> of our <S%H776>country<s%>, who hath <S%H2491>slain<s%> many of <S%H7235>us<s%>.

And it came to <S%H3820>pass<s%>, when their hearts were <S%H2896>merry<s%>, that they <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7121>Call<s%> for <S%H8123>Samson<s%>, that he may make us <S%H7832>sport<s%>. And they <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H8123>Samson<s%> out of <S%H631>the<s%> <S%H1004>prison-house<s%>; and he made <S%H6711>sport<s%> before <S%H6440>them<s%>. And they <S%H5975>set<s%> him between the <S%H5982>pillars<s%>:

and <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H5288>lad<s%> that <S%H2388>held<s%> him by the <S%H3027>hand<s%>, <S%H3240>Suffer<s%> me that I may <S%H4184>feel<s%> the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> whereupon the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3559>resteth<s%>, that I may lean upon <S%H8172>them<s%>.

Now the <S%H1004>house<s%> was <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H582>men<s%> and <S%H802>women<s%>; and all the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> were <S%H1406>there<s%>; and there were upon the roof about <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> and <S%H802>women<s%>, that <S%H7200>beheld<s%> while <S%H8123>Samson<s%> made <S%H7832>sport<s%>.

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H2388>me<s%>, I pray thee, and strengthen <S%H6471>me<s%>, I pray thee, only this once, O <S%H430>God<s%>, that I may be at <S%H259>once<s%> <S%H5358>avenged<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> for my <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> took <S%H3943>hold<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8432>middle<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> upon which the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3559>rested<s%>, <S%H5564><s%> and leaned upon <S%H259>them<s%>, the one with his right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, and the <S%H259>other<s%> with his <S%H8040>left<s%>.

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Let me <S%H4191>die<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>. And he <S%H5186>bowed<s%> himself with all his <S%H3581>might<s%>; and the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon the <S%H5633>lords<s%>, and upon all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were <S%H4191>therein<s%>. So the dead that he <S%H4191>slew<s%> at his <S%H4194>death<s%> were <S%H7227>more<s%> than they that he <S%H4191>slew<s%> in his <S%H2416>life<s%>.

Then his <S%H251>brethren<s%> and all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%>, and <S%H5375>took<s%> <S%H5927>him<s%>, and brought him up, and <S%H6912>buried<s%> him between <S%H6881>Zorah<s%> and <S%H847>Eshtaol<s%> in the <S%H6913>burying-place<s%> of <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>. And he <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.
